title: Nothing happens when I search "Vi"
body:
I bought RP specifically to buy the Warring Kingdoms Vi skin. Vi will not show up in any of my searches. I went through and found Vi, tried to click the 'unlock' button on the skin, it just blares the annoying sound through my speakers. Nothing about it works.

I cannot figure out how to post a screenshot at the moment, first time poster.

Edit:
here are some imgur links.


my search for 'vi' in the champion section
http://i.imgur.com/ZX16aGi.png


i literally just searched the letter 'v' 
http://i.imgur.com/qqUsRZp.png

me trying to purchase skin by smashing the 'unlock' symbol
http://i.imgur.com/7z7CFe2.png

i'm smashing the 'unlock' button with the required amount of RP, nothing happens. it just blares annoying noises. 

I'm actually upset. My last two games were bugged, my q would not respond, my f key would not respond, I was okay with that. Now I am annoyed.

replies.body: Ahhhh so Vi wasn't showing up when you searched for champions because you actually already own her! That skin doesn't seem like it's currently up for sale in the store right now, but you can be sure to know when it is by checking the [**sales page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales)!
Thank you for the reply. I am not trying to purchase the skin 'on sale,' I simply want to buy it outright. I am in the middle of a patch download and will update afterwards.

Little clarification, the skin isn't available at all in the store right now. The Warring Kingdom skins are partly considered [**Holiday Legacy skins**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944), which means they're not always purchasable in the store.
